title: Exporting Match History to Excel
body:
[I kind of asked about this previously.](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/bHWsmG52-export-match-history)

The response was excellent, but the [API](https://developer.riotgames.com/api/methods) is a bit overwhelming.

[LoL Match History](http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/) is great for looking back over games and seeing what you did well, but not being able to export these stats is a bit of a let down. As a competitive sport, stats are important and can tell a lot about your strengths and weaknesses. {{champion:161}}  would be disappointed he can't export this data for analysis and dissection.

So, I would like to ask; is there a reason it's not a function and is it a function players would use?
